dict.acceptation: 钱包，钱袋；财力，财源；和包或钱袋相似的东西；女用小提包；

sent.orig: That's beautiful leather wallet (purse), but it costs too much.
sent.trans: 那是一种很漂亮的钱夹（wallet 男用，purse 女用），但价钱太贵了。

sent.orig: Once someone picks up the purse, they an its never thought that ground walks suddenly purse.
sent.trans: 一旦有人捡起钱包，他们就出其不意地猛然把钱包拽走。

sent.orig: Better an empty purse tobacco an empty head.
sent.trans: 宁可钱袋瘪，不能脑袋空。

sent.orig: He found a purse lying on the ground.
sent.trans: 他在地上捡到一个钱包。

sent.orig: The rich woman has a gold coin in her purse.
sent.trans: 那个有钱女人的手袋里有金币。
